interestingFacts: India is the world's largest democracy and the second-most populous country.
The United States is home to the world's largest economy.
China has the Great Wall, one of the seven wonders of the world.
Japan is known for its technology and traditional culture, including sushi and samurai.
Brazil is famous for its Carnival festival and the Amazon rainforest.
Germany is known for its engineering, beer, and the Oktoberfest festival.
The UK has a rich history, including the monarchy and the Tower of London.
South Africa is known as the 'Rainbow Nation' due to its diverse cultures.
Australia is famous for the Great Barrier Reef and unique wildlife like kangaroos.
